abstract: Background on asbestos is presented including the different types and the important medical distinctions between those different types. The four diseases associated with asbestos exposure are discussed: mesothelioma, lung cancer, asbestosis, and benign pleural disorders. The purpose of the LeRC Asbestos Surveillance Program is outlined, and the specifics of the Medical Surveillance Program for Asbestos Monitoring at LeRC are discussed.
title: Asbestos Surveillance Program

publications.publicationName: BioTechnology, Inc., Proceedings of the 1992 Annual Meeting NASA Occupational Health Program
